definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
when the melon is ripe, it falls (idiom); problems sort themselves out in the fullness of time

sentences.english: Right now, Hockaday's prototypes put out only a few milli- watts of power.
sentences.chinese: 現在，霍克蒂的燃料電池原型只能輸出幾毫瓦的電力。

sentences.english: Tiffany told me and the police that he had a heart stroke while they were in bed.
sentences.chinese: 蒂芙妮對警察對我說是他是在牀上犯了心臟病猝死。

sentences.english: He would have gladly exchanged it all for a single word from Nadyezhda.
sentences.chinese: 他願將所有這一切換得娜蒂契達的隻言片語。

sentences.english: I get so kilig everytime Ben and Felicity get together.
sentences.chinese: 每次我看到本和費利西蒂在一起時就讓我臉紅心跳的。

sentences.english: Moratti continued talking about what would have made Facchetti happy.
sentences.chinese: 莫拉蒂繼續談到了會讓法切蒂開心的事情。

sentences.english: It is said that mehndi brings good fortune to a person's life.
sentences.chinese: 據說“曼海蒂”能給人們的生活帶來好運。

sentences.english: In the jungles of 1)Guatemala, in Tikal, stands a temple.
sentences.chinese: 在危地馬拉叢林深處的蒂卡爾，矗立着一座神廟。

sentences.english: This impudent criticism was my first contribution to the Bharati.
sentences.chinese: 這篇狂妄的批評就是我第一次對《婆羅蒂》的投稿。

sentences.english: Wash eggplant, remove stalks, oblique dual joint thick.
sentences.chinese: 將茄子洗淨，去蒂，斜切成雙聯厚片。

sentences.english: I dare you to skateboard to Krusty Burger and back.
sentences.chinese: 我說你不敢踩着滑板往返庫里斯蒂漢堡。

sentences.english: Werent you once freids with Facchetti?
sentences.chinese: 你和法切蒂曾經是好朋友？

sentences.english: Thus, Tiago locked Cobolli in the washroom as a sort of revenge.
sentences.chinese: 因此，蒂亞戈把吉利鎖在廁所裏作爲對他的小報復。

sentences.english: There is the story of 17-year-old Betsy.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個關於17歲的女孩貝斯蒂的故事。

sentences.english: The imitated operation for designing cable - style nerve graft with nutrient vessel were operated.
sentences.chinese: 設計帶伴行營養血管蒂腓腸神經電纜式神經移植體。

sentences.english: The teacher spoke in a very stern voice and Timothy had to follow her to her room.
sentences.chinese: 老師說得很嚴厲，蒂莫西只得跟她進房間。

sentences.english: However, Doc reveals he was wearing a bulletproof vest after reading the letter.
sentences.chinese: 幸好博士因爲讀過馬蒂的信，事先穿了一件防彈服。

definition: woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor
see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)
